subject: Additional Tools
question:
Write the 2 methods to do multiple selection with VS:
1. Adds secondary cursors for manually selecting non-consecutive text:
2. Having selected some text, selects the next instance of the current selection:
answer:
1. Adds secondary cursors for manually selecting non-consecutive text: Alt + Click
2. Having selected some text, selects the next instance of the current selection: Ctrl + D
